title: Dirt Road Dreams
description: Life isn t a smooth road. It is an ebb and flow of joy and sorrow. Join poet Susie Clevenger, as she takes the reader on a journey through experience. She toughens her feet by walking barefoot on gravel, and then finds herself rebelliously kicking up sand until she finally learns the joy of dancing in dust. In this collection you will share in the growth of a soul, and view life s joy and sorrow through the unique vision of Susie s pen.
author: Susie Clevenger
